metadata.title: USN-6208-1 -- Gorilla WebSocket vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Gorilla WebSocket incorrectly handled decoding WebSocket frames. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6208-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  golang-websocket-dev - 0.0~git20150811.0.b6ab76f-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
